definitions.definition: The lowest class of society ; also, the lower classes of society generally; the masses .

Wage earners collectively; people who own no capital and depend on their labour for survival ; the working class , especially when seen as engaged in a class struggle with the bourgeoisie ( “ the capital-owning class ” ) .
The lowest class of citizens , who had no property and few rights , and were regarded as contributing only their offspring to the state .

main_definition: ( often derogatory , also figuratively ) The lowest class of society ; also, the lower classes of society generally; the masses .
secondary_definitions: ( Marxism ) Wage earners collectively; people who own no capital and depend on their labour for survival ; the working class , especially when seen as engaged in a class struggle with the bourgeoisie ( “ the capital-owning class ” ) .
( chiefly Ancient Rome , historical ) The lowest class of citizens , who had no property and few rights , and were regarded as contributing only their offspring to the state .
